reasoning: This trade improves Team A's RB1 position with Bijan Robinson (18.5 proj) over Breece Hall (12.7 proj). DJ Moore (13.1 proj) is a slight upgrade over Deebo Samuel (11.5 proj) at WR. Team A can afford to trade Josh Allen due to having Patrick Mahomes as QB1. Team B gets a high-upside RB in Hall, a versatile WR in Samuel, and a significant QB upgrade with Allen. This trade balances immediate production and long-term potential for both teams.
